FKAT
======

.. image:: ../logo.png
   :align: center
   :width: 400
   :alt: FKAT

Welcome to FKAT, Foundational Kit for AI Training!

This package provides everything necessary to train, validate, predict and test AI models.

**GETTING STARTED?** Follow the :doc:`quickstart guide<quickstart>`.
